articles.author: GERALD IMRAY, MOGOMOTSI MAGOME
articles.title: South Africa election: Early results put ruling ANC short of a majority - The Associated Press
articles.description: Partial results in South Africa’s national election have put the long-ruling African National Congress at less than 50% of the vote. It raises the possibility that it might lose its majority for the first time since it swept to power under Nelson Mandela at t…
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG (AP) Partial results in South Africas national election put the long-ruling African National Congress party at well below 50% of the vote as counting continued Thursday, and it could be … [+6184 chars]
